notes: NOTE: Design tokens are based on common patterns. Please verify against actual Figma design and update colors, spacing, and typography values to match exactly.
All icons should be exported as SVGs from Figma and placed in /src/assets/icons
Images should be exported at 1x and 2x resolutions (2x for retina displays)
Use semantic HTML elements (header, nav, main, section, footer, article, aside)
Implement proper ARIA labels for accessibility
All interactive elements must have focus states
Use Tailwind utility classes; extend config for custom values
Components should be small and single-responsibility
Export instructions: Export frames as PNG/JPG at 1x and 2x, icons as SVG
If custom fonts are used in Figma, add @import in index.css or use closest system font fallback
